name: Pew Pew: The Galactic Enigma
description:
This alpha/demo game is one I put together in about 3-4 days. I had an idea for some kind of puzzle game, but I didn't have any way to make it original until I saw the theme for the contest. Then I decided to make the main character a cat! It is a sci-fi puzzle game where you play as a cat, named Pew Pew, from the future. You are sent to this strange planet to discover a strange anomaly only to find a planet riddled with puzzle which hide some powerful secret to the galaxy.

ATTENTION - There are some small minor bugs. Also, some parts are widely unfinished (such as typo errors here and there.) My time was really tight due to my classes for college. This is actually my first game I have ever built, finished, packaged and uploaded for others so bear with me if there are bugs. 

[one thing, there is no main menu screen, and the only way to exit the game is 'alt+tab' then right-click the application and close it, sorry about that. I'll be sure to add one for the next build of the game]

Thank- you to:

Thank you to EPIC games for all of their content and every other content creator on the Marketplace! This game was made with free assets only!

Assets used in the project:

- Dead Hills Landscape - Pixel Perfect Polygons

- Desert Assets - EPIC Games

- Siamese Cat Model - Gwinna from Blendswap

- The Final Frontier Soundtrack - Luke West

- VR Assets - EPIC Games

- Cat Statue - free blendswap model

- Shipyard assets - free blendswap model

- Everything else was made during the time of the contest including all puzzle elements, map designs, animations, materials, sequences, etc etc...

Special thanks to Gwinna from blendswap for the free Siamese Cat model! He was perfect for the game. Also special thanks to Luke West for release such an awesome sci-fi song for free! Be sure to check it out 'The Last Frontier'!
